app_descript:
HBO GO App Description

Brief: HBO GO offers a premium streaming experience for fans of HBO's rich content library. With this app, subscribers can dive into every season of groundbreaking original series, including "Game of Thrones" and "Big Little Lies," just one hour after they air in the United States. In addition to series, users have access to a variety of movies, talk shows, special events, and weekly updates of fresh content.

Please note, the description provided considers historical data and might not reflect the current state of HBO GO and HBO Now services which were rebranded to HBO Max. HBO Max consolidates HBO GO and HBO Now's offerings into a single platform, which may have altered availability, pricing, or service details. Always refer to the latest information from HBO for the most current service details.
